arts.ttl: Hellas Verona vs. Parma, a face-off for safety
arts.sum: Hellas Verona have won their last five home matches against Parma in Serie A and could record six consecutive home wins against a single opponent in the competition for the first time in their history. Among the teams faced at least 15 times in Serie A, Parma is the one against which Hellas Verona have the highest win percentage: 53%, with 10 wins in 19 matches played so far (D3 L6).
